Algorithms
Class JPAbstractAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  Algorithms.JPAbstractAlgorithm
Direct Known Subclasses:
FuzzySimilarityAlgorithm, LevenshteinDistanceAlgorithm, OnthologyBasedQueryAlgorithm, TFIDFAlgorithm
public abstract class JPAbstractAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

The Class JPAbstractAlgorithm. Abstract class the represents an algorithm. All algorithms should extend this class.
